column5: Not sure if this was reported already but better be safe than sorry. Supposedly some already seen in Markham  and none so far in Ottawa area. On a company memo it said that it could cause severe skin burns and temporary or permanent Blindness.  Here is one of the link about it. http://www.omafra.gov.on.ca/english/crops/...eed.htm#content  here is the link that my Heath and Safety Dept received.
